column4: hey i have installed this game Liquid War 6 and it is not completing hte final 'make install'. further more wwhen i run a check i get "liquidwar6: couldn't find backend gfx/gl in /usr/local/lib/liquidwar6-0.0.3beta/gfx/libmod_gl-0.0.3beta.so
liquidwar6: WARNING! (errno=2:ENOENT) unable to open gfx backend "gl"
make sure you install the -dev packages of the dependencies
